name: Ba (itch)
description:
Ba is an atmospheric walk simulator. Explore the world, discover spells and solve puzzles to fix this world's problem.

Explore the world

Acquire knowledge to move forward. Through experimentation, trial and error you'll discover the secrets of this place.

Solve puzzles

In your journey, you'll encounter puzzles that can be beaten in multiple ways as long as you understand the rules. The more knowledge you have, the more creative you can be.

FAQ Will there be updates? Yes, this game will have free content updates. Once claimed, you'll receive an e-mail when an update is available. I found a bug! Great, a bug hunter! Please send me an e-mail or a tweet describing what happened, try to be specific so it's easier to solve the issue.

 

Subscribe to my newsletter so I can keep you updated about cool games I release and give you early access.

 

Questions

If you have any questions please send me an e-mail or a tweet, I'd be happy to help you out and answer any questions.
